name: You're Fired! (Ateune, bteune)
description:
You're Fired!  Put out the fires as fast as you can! 

Harness your hose and fly out of control as you put fires out in harder to reach places!

Controls:
  • Movement:  WASD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Fire:  Left-Click or CTRL
  • Use the hose for propulsion
Developers:
  •  https://btunez.itch.io/
  •  https://ateune.itch.io/

A submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020, with the theme of "Out of Control"
